ProjectDescr.Title: Single-cell long-read sequencing of Lucat1 KO mouse PBMC
ProjectDescr.Description: LUCAT1 is a popular oncogenic lncRNA. According to previous study, we have discovered that the lncRNA is closely related to tumor-associated macrophage. Therefore single-cell long-read sequencing was conducted with Lucat1 KO mouse PBMC, in order to understand the characteristics of Lucat1. We are expecting to have deeper understanding about LUCAT1, and its connection with cancer with the project.

Grant.Title: Functional Characterization of Bifunctional Genes via Deep Single-Molecule RNA Sequencing
